## isNumber() function

Determines whether an input is number or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNumber(value: unknown): value is number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | input |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is number

true if the input is number, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isNumber(1)           // true
isNumber(NaN)         // false
isNumber(Infinity)    // false
isNumber("1")         // false
```
